title: Latavius Murray Reportedly Meeting With Vikings | Vikings Blog | KFAN FM 100.3
text:
Latavius Murray Reportedly Meeting With Vikings posted by Alexander Shun - 
Alexander Shun | @alexpshun 
Digital Content Manager | KFAN.com 
After Eddie Lacy spent the weekend with the Minnesota Vikings only to leave and sign with the Seattle Seahawks, the Vikings were still searching for an answer at the running back position. Enter former Oakland Raider Latavius Murray. 
According to NFL insider Adam Schefter and other sources, Murray is visiting with the Vikings today. 
Reporter Chris Tomasson even went so far as to report that Murray signing with the team wouldn't be a surprise. Raiders' RB Latavius Murray is visiting the Vikings today, per source.Jamaal Charles' visit to Seattle on Wednesday is still on. — Adam Schefter (@AdamSchefter) March 14, 2017 Source confirms Raiders free-agent running back Latavius Murray is visiting the #Vikings today. Won't be surprised if he signs with them. — Chris Tomasson (@christomasson) March 14, 2017 
Murray finished last season with 788 rushing yards and 12 touchdowns on 195 carries in 14 games for the Raiders while adding 33 catches for 264 yards. Check out Vikings.com for more information and Minnesota Vikings coverage throughout the year! Contact
